title: loop
description: Set the loop mode for the queue in this server.
---

Set the loop mode for the queue in this server.

## Usage

```sh
;loop
;loop off
;loop song
;loop queue
```

## Examples

```sh
# toggle the loop mode
;loop
# disable loop
;loop off
# loop the current song
;loop song
# loop the queue
;loop queue
```
